result.summary: Storm: Show the line, then hold it. Storm: Look again—slowly.

card_notes.note:
Storm: Show the line, then hold it.

You’re bluffing or staying silent until eruption.

Decide.

Storm: Look again—slowly.

You’re stepping on the same pain again because you refuse to look down. Or you’re seeing threat everywhere because you’re tired.

Spot the sting.

Storm: Hold the line. No exceptions.

You’re over-controlling because you don’t trust life. Or you’re reckless because you’re numb.

Act instantly.

advice: Truth arrives fast. The window is short. Act cleanly and decisively.
Treat this as guidance, not a fixed outcome.
